summary.Title: Software Engineer (Ethical Hacker)
summary.Presentation: You’re a white hat hacker ready to use your skills at a highly ethical company. We’re a global tech scale-up on a mission to improve online fairness for billions of users. Let’s join forces.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
You’re a white hat hacker ready to use your skills at a highly ethical company. We’re a global tech scale-up on a mission to improve online fairness for billions of users. Let’s join forces.

About us

Queue-it is a Danish tech scale-up that empowers the world’s biggest brands to deliver on their busiest days. Our virtual waiting rooms prevent website crashes and bot abuse to create a smoother, fairer online experience for 35 billion+ users.

Queue-it is a place where you can do what you are naturally best at to positively maintain your performance. We’re a diverse team coming from 50+ countries with offices in Denmark, the U.S., and Australia.

About the role

As a Queue-it Software Engineer, you’ll join an autonomous development team working towards the mission of online fairness for all. You’ll be a critical defender of regular people against ticket scalpers, sneaker bots, and other bad actors creating an unfair game.

At Queue-it, we face a constant struggle to keep our queues clear from abuse. In this role, you will play a vital role in making the online world a better, fairer place by monitoring misconduct and designing and implementing mitigation initiatives.

Responsibilities

Design and verify security improvements to our bot and abuse SaaS offerings. Using a hacker mindset, deliver fresh ideas and insights to build solid solutions that will have an impact on billions of end users.

Collaborate for success. Work with a smart, motivated backend development team to design and QA test final solutions.

Validate mitigation solutions. Build bots/scripts that verify your initiatives.

Qualifications

5+ years experience in a similar role

Solid understanding of web technologies and network security

Experience as a PenTester, or have used and developed bot scripts/tools

Basic understanding/experience with object-oriented programming (ex. C#)

Experience with Cloud (AWS, Azure, etc.) would be beneficial

Proficiency in English (Danish not required)

We are looking for someone who

Considers yourself a white hat hacker with high ethical standards

Likes finding exploits and traversing logs and data

Is a creative puzzle solver

Is team-oriented

Why Queue-it is a great place to work

Continuous learning: You’ll develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next.

Success as defined by you: We’ll provide the tools and flexibility, so you can make a meaningful impact, your way.

Diverse and inclusive culture: You’ll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice so that others can find theirs. In a company with 50+ nationalities, you will be able to enjoy a truly intercultural and inclusive environment.

About the office 

Located in the heart of Copenhagen, the Queue-it headquarters offers modern amenities, collaborative spaces, and quiet zones to suit all work styles – plus games, ping pong, foosball, PS4, social events, clubs, and great coffee, lunch, & snacks!

--

Apply today!

Please submit all materials in English

Due to GDPR regulations, we cannot accept applications/CVs via email. Please apply online to be considered.

Queue-it is committed to employing a diverse staff. Qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, veteran status, or disability.

Department

Technology

Role

Software Engineer

Locations

Copenhagen - DK

Employment type

Full-time

Language

English
